name: Finger Soccer
description:
"Finger Soccer" is a casual competitive game. The game uses catapults to carry out intense football matches.
【Game Operation】
Click the left mouse button to pull back, release the left mouse button and the player will bounce forward.
【Game Mode】
The game is divided into 4 modes, namely: practice mode, double confrontation mode, World Cup mode, penalty shootout mode.

【Game Features】
Players can choose different national teams to compete, and different teams have different attributes. At the same time, you can choose the game formation. Players need to control the angle and strength to win the game. Congratulations in advance to your team winning the World Cup.
